metadata.title: CVE-2016-9998 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: SPIP 3.1.x suffer from a Reflected Cross Site Scripting Vulnerability in /ecrire/exec/info_plugin.php involving the `$plugin` parameter, as demonstrated by a /ecrire/?exec=info_plugin URL.

criterions.comment: spip package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.1.4-2').
